name: Brucellosis
information: Brucellosis is a highly contagious bacterial disease that affects cattle and can be transmitted to humans. It's caused by various species of Brucella bacteria.
remedies: No effective treatment for infected animals
Thorough cleaning and disinfection of contaminated areas

causes.main: Infection by Brucella bacteria, primarily Brucella abortus in cattle
specific_causes: Consumption of contaminated feed or water

prevention: Testing and removal of infected animals
Proper disposal of aborted fetuses and placentas
